result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Kory L. Deacy
Current: 109 West Vinal St., Apt. 6, P.O. Box 61, Wittenberg, WI 54499 United States  (Effective: 09-06-2022)

Court calls 22CF112 & 20CF166 @ 1:37 PM Defendant Kory L. Deacy in court.  Attorney Julianne M Lennon in court for Kory L. Deacy.  Attorney Kelly Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. 20CF166 set for Status Cnf & 22CF112 set for Preliminary hearing.  Atty Lennon requesting preliminary hearing. State is ready to proceed.  Captain Daniel Duley, City of Antigo Police Department, duly sworn on oath, testifies. State ask court to take judicial notice of 20CF166. Atty Lennon has no objection.  Court takes judicial notice of own files.  State ask court to take judicial notice 18CF7. Atty Lennon makes note on 18CF7. Court takes judicial notice of 18CF7.  State rest. Atty Lennon has no witness.  State ask for bind over and gives argument.  Atty Lennon gives argument.  Court finds probable cause and binds over. Information filed electronically.  Atty Lennon waives reading if track complaint and enters Not Guilty plea. Court enters Not Guilty plea. Bond continues.
Status conference scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

1:55 PM Defendant Kory L. Deacy appeared by video, in custody, via zoom.  Attorney Julianne M Lennon in court for Kory L. Deacy, via zoom.  Attorney Kelly Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Lennon has copy of complaint, waives reading, reserve rights,  not guilty on misdemeanor and request timely p.h.  Atty Lennon may appear via zoom for hearing. Not a victim case.  Bond continues.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

3:34 PM Defendant Kory L. Deacy appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kelly Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. All parties via zoom.  Court reviews history of case. Status of Counsel report filed. Def. wants counsel and request court appointed atty. Court explains def. qualifies for PD and may not be approved for court appointed atty.. Court finds good cause.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

to Withdraw as Counsel
(routed to Judge's JA)

3:47 PM Defendant Kory L. Deacy appeared by video, in custody, via zoom.  Attorney Kelly Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews history of case. Def. did not hear anything from P.D. and would like to be heard on dean hearing. Def. wants counsel. Court finds request for atty rights and heard on Nhia Lee standards. Def. does qualify for Public Defender.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 12:30 am.

3:35 PM Defendant Kory L. Deacy appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin. All parties via zoom. Def. contacted P.D. Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

1:10 PM in Room 301. Defendant Kory L. Deacy appears by video, in custody.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin. All appearances are by Zoom. Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options, PD, hire own or court appointed atty. Def. will contact PD. State heard on bond, recommends $10,000 signature bond with conditions No illegal use or possession of controlled substances. No contact with Jennifer Barth or Conner Vande Weerd. The Court orders $10,000 signature bond with conditions as requested.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
